title: Need players (gold +) for ESL tornament
body:
Need 2 more players for an ESL tournament (gold +) 

we currently need a Top and a ADC 

Tell us your Rank, Champion pool and age below and ill add you to the team


WE NOW ARE FULL THANK YOU

Thank you
